Items.Title: Oversight - Facial Recognition Technology and the Collection of Biometric Data.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to prohibiting places or providers of public accommodation from using biometric recognition technology and protecting any biometric identifier information collected
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting places or providers of public accommodation from using biometric recognition technology and protecting any biometric identifier information collected.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the use of facial recognition technology in residential buildings
Items.MatterName: Limiting the use of facial recognition technology in residential buildings.
